body: Bahraini Mahmood Al Yousif discusses the trial of 25 Bahrainis, among them blogger Ali Abdulemam, who are "accused of crimes against the state, everything from sedition through to terrorism and incitement against the regime, all of which carry rather heavy sentences."
original_body: Bahraini Mahmood Al Yousif discusses the trial of 25 Bahrainis, among them blogger Ali Abdulemam, who are "accused of crimes against the state, everything from sedition through to terrorism and incitement against the regime, all of which carry rather heavy sentences."
title: Bahrain: A Mistrial?
